title: Harold Hughes Commission on Alcoholism Act
content: Harold Hughes Commission on Alcoholism Act - Establishes the Harold Hughes Commission on Alcoholism to study: (1) existing Federal agencies and programs related to alcoholism. (2) public education, both directly by governmental agencies and by governmental agencies working with private sector groups, (3) physician instruction, (4) unmet research needs, and (5) treatment effectiveness and cost- effectiveness. Authorizes appropriations.
